scripts.check:versions: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const nodeVersion = process.version.slice(1); const [major] = nodeVersion.split('.'); const [reqMajor] = pkg.engines.node.replace('>=', '').split('.'); if (parseInt(major) < parseInt(reqMajor)) { console.error('❌ Node.js version mismatch!'); console.error(`Required: ${pkg.engines.node}`); console.error(`Current: v${nodeVersion}`); console.error('\nPlease use nvm or fnm to install the correct version:'); console.error('  nvm use'); console.error('  # or'); console.error('  fnm use'); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ Node.js version check passed: v' + nodeVersion);"
